issue.summary: Hsa6- PPIL4/LATS1 problem region
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an insertion between BX276089.8 and AL583963.11
issue.resolution_text: Component AL583963.11 updated to AL583963.12 in build 36 correcting the assembly problem. The updated component is consistent with optical mapping data and end sequence alignments.

issue.summary: GeneID: 100337622 (DDX11L4), missing in assembly
issue.description: NG_016472.1 is based on AM992866.1, and has many hits to subtelomeric regions on various chromosomes. The copy of this gene on AM992866.1 is partial, so it is currently being classified as a pseudogene. AM992866.1 is from a chr 6 mapping cell line, but there are no hits on GRCh37 chr 6, so it appears that this subtelomeric gene on chr 6 currently isn't represented.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible missing sequence in assembly component AL513210.32
issue.description: Possible under-representation of tandem repeat copy number in reference component AL513210.32.
issue.resolution_text: AC225168.3 represents a sequence variant containing approximately 30kb more of a tandem repeat sequence than is found in GRCh37 NC_000006.11 component AL513210.32. This has been added to the ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF.

issue.summary: Confirm scaffold3678_593949_731090.33:1-11645 is a correctly assembled human sequence.
issue.description: Confirm that scaffold3678_593949_731090.33:1-11645, a large YH1 scaffold that doesn't align to either GRCh37.p2 or sequences in NR, is a correctly assembled human sequence.
issue.resolution_text: scaffold3678_593949_731090.33:1-11645 has a high quality alignment to HuRef scaffold NW_001838996.1, and is represented in the YH1 assembly by GL297412.1. This sequence may belong in the gap being investigated in HG-564. Efforts to include this sequence in the assembly will be tracked in HG-564.

issue.summary: Alignment analysis suggests approx. 105 kb may be missing from the reference assembly
issue.status_text: 13-JUN-13: CH17-290J22 is in active finishing Accession for CH17-290J22: FO680664
issue.description: The reference may be missing ~105kb in the vicinity of AL591110.4.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 25842 (ASF1A), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_014034.1:1..444 does not align to NT_025741.14, but does align to NW_923184.1. This is not near a component join; AL132874.30 appears to contain an internal clone deletion artifact
issue.resolution_text: ABC13-49702400B10; accession FP885910 has been sequenced to correct the deletion occuring in AL132874. Refseq NM_014034.1now aligns to the reference assembly.

issue.summary: Variation or missing sequence in AL450345.6?
issue.description: Alignment of sequences from HuRef and YH1 to GRCh37 suggest ~7.5 kb sequence may be missing from within reference component AL450345.6 (RP11-300M24)
issue.resolution_text: Component FO681540.2 (ABC10-43608400O15) has been sequenced and patches a deletion in the reference, adding 7.5kb to the assembly.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC209234.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383533.1 created to capture sequence from AC209234.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383533.1 created to capture ~27.8 kb sequence from AC209234.3 not represented in reference chromosome NC_000006.11.

issue.summary: GeneID: 5558 (PRIM2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.status_text: 18-MAR-13: CH17-406B19 is in active finishing Accession for CH17-406B19: FO680682
issue.description: NM_000947.2 has a 1-nt mismatch vs AL137184.15, C vs G. The G in the genome results in a premature stop codon (TAG) which would make the transcript NMD. The RefSeq C is supported by 7 transcripts; the G in the genome is not supported by any transcripts.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible path error
issue.status_text: 18-MAR-13: CH17-406B19 is in active finishing Accession for CH17-406B19: FO680682
issue.description: The two clone sequences AL121975.9 (from clone RP3-422B11) and AL121958.6 (from clone RP1-71H19) have been joined together but they actually belong to two distinct paralogs. In fact, the region chr6:57,206,000-57,574,000 is duplicated (and contains gene/pseudogene PRIM2B) and what is being represented in the reference and named PRIM2 is actually a hybrid of PRIM2A and PRIM2B. These two paralogs are likely to both belong to region 6p11.2.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 5460 (POU5F1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: The representation of POU5F1 (GeneID:5460) on Build 36 component AL662844.12 is not the common allele.
issue.resolution_text: The common allele of POU5F1 (GeneID:5460) is present in GRCh37 on MHC alt loci scaffold NT_167248.1 (QBL), in component AL773544.5.

issue.summary: Update gap size method ALIGNMENT on MHC alt loci TPFs
issue.description: Gap method ALIGNMENT found on MHC alt loci TPFs should be updated to new method type in preparation for AGP2.0.
issue.resolution_text: Both the chromosome 6 MHC TPF's and the chromosome 19 LRC TPF's have been updated to meet the AGP2.0 format.

issue.summary: Wrong/Rare base in Exon 6 of DSP gene
issue.description: Large scale sequencing/genotyping suggests that the reference allele at rs2806234 (T) is a rare or wrong allele. This base lies in exon 6 of the DSP gene.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF458095.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AL031058.1 and improving the alignment of DSP to the reference.

issue.summary: Large scale sequencing/genotype suggests wrong sequence in Exon 8 of LAMA4 gene
issue.description: Large scale sequencing/genotyping suggests that two reference bases in exon 8 of LAMA4 are incorrect. The bases are defined by rs71543223 and suggest the reference sequence should be 'GT' rather than 'TG'.
issue.resolution_text: Sequence errors in the reference genome at chr6:11250869-70 affecting the LAMA4 gene have been corrected. The affected component has been updated to Z99289.2, this contains the corrected sequence.

issue.summary: Incorrect alignment causing path problem in MHC alt_loci_1 (Hschr6_MHC_APD_ctg1/GL000250.1/NT_167244.1)
issue.description: Bad alignment for CR925767.6/CU019528.1 has resulted in sequence from CR925767.6 being inadvertently excluded from this alt loci.
issue.resolution_text: A new alignment was loaded for CR925767.6/CU019528.1that allows the full extent of CR925767.6 to be included in the assembly.

issue.summary: ALT_REF_LOCI_1 (APD) reference anchor switch point
issue.description: Incorrect switch point in ALT_REF_LOCI_1 (APD) between the reference anchor and the first haplotype-specific clone result in the anchor sequence being used over the correct haplotype sequence in the alt loci.
issue.resolution_text: Switch point curated so that the haplotype-specific sequence is represented in the alt loci over the reference anchor.

issue.summary: ALT_REF_LOCI_2 (COX) reference anchor switch point
issue.description: Incorrect switch point in ALT_REF_LOCI_2 (COX) between the reference anchor and the first haplotype-specific clone result in the anchor sequence being used over the correct haplotype sequence in the alt loci.
issue.resolution_text: Switch point curated so that the haplotype-specific sequence is represented in the alt loci over the reference anchor.

issue.description: Incorrect switch point in ALT_REF_LOCI_4 (MANN) between the reference anchor and the first haplotype-specific clone result in the anchor sequence being used over the correct haplotype sequence in the alt loci.
issue.resolution_text: Switch point curated so that the haplotype-specific sequence is represented in the alt loci over the reference anchor.

issue.summary: ALT_REF_LOCI_6 (QBL) reference anchor switch point

issue.summary: ALT_REF_LOCI_7 (SSTO) reference anchor switch point

issue.resolution_text: Switch point curated so that the haplotype-specific sequence is represented in the alt loci over the reference anchor.

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP21A2 is not the clinical standard
issue.status_text: Waiting for community response to see if a change to the RefSeq gene and assembly representation of CYP* is needed.
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP21A2 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Optical Map indicates deletion occuring in AL607068.10
issue.status_text: 02-JUL-13: CH17-321J16 is in active finishing Accession for CH17-321J16: FO681522
issue.description: Optical map analysis is consistent with a deletion in the genome occuring in AL607068.10
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Optical Map indicates deletion occuring in AL596089.19
issue.status_text: 29-NOV-12: CH17-206G12 has entered the sequencing pipeline
issue.description: Optical map analysis is consistent with a deletion in the genome occuring in AL596089.19
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Gap in MHC alt locus NT_167247.1 results in a partial representation of HLA-A
issue.status_text: The MHC paths are derived from cell line specific clone libraries, as such our current library resources cannot be used to provide additional sequence for this ALT LOCI. We are currently attempting to gauge the availability of these cell line specific libraries in order to provide additional sequence representation.
issue.description: A gap in the MHC alternate loci scaffold GL000254.1/NT_167247.1 results in an incomplete representation of the HLA-A gene.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: PPT2-EGFL8
issue.status_text: The MHC paths are derived from cell line specific clone libraries, as such our current library resources cannot be used to provide additional sequence for this ALT LOCI. We are currently attempting to gauge the availability of these cell line specific libraries in order to provide additional sequence representation.
issue.description: A gap in GL000252.1/NT_167245.1 (GRCh37.p9 ALT_REF_LOCI_3) at 3407000^3481305 resulted in the entire sequence of EGFL8 gene missing on this alt. assembly.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chromosome 6 gap problem
issue.status_text: 18-MAR-13: CH17-406B19 is in active finishing Accession for CH17-406B19: FO680682
issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between components AL121975.9 and AL596065.3
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chromosome 6 gap problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between AL590544.7 and AL049551.1
issue.resolution_text: There was a gap between AL590544.7 and AL049551.1 in GRCh37. In GRCh38 component AL590544.7 was removed and component FP325349.3 was added to the TPF extending in to the gap between AL049551.1 and AL356131.12 from AL049551.1. This scaffold adds component LO000005.2 (CH17-181I5) to the reference assembly which replaces GRCh38 WGS components of AMYH02013791.1, AEKP01189807.1, AEKP01189806.1, AEKP01189805.1, AEKP01189804.1, AEKP01189803.1 and AEKP01189802.1 and closing the gap between FP325349.3 and AL356131.12.

issue.status_text: 19-JUN-13: CH17-258P2 has completed sequence production and a draft assembly has been submitted 20-JUN-13: WI2-890L14 is ready to enter the sequencing pipeline 19-MAY-14: ABC12-46882200M22 is ready to enter the sequencing pipeline 29-AUG-13: ABC7-40639600C3 is ready to enter the sequencing pipeline 11-JUN-13: CH17-87H15 is ready to enter the sequencing pipeline 17-DEC-14: ABC10-46306700I23 has entered the sequencing pipeline 11-JUN-13: WI2-926N6 is ready to enter the sequencing pipeline 17-DEC-14: ABC10-43441000F2 has entered the sequencing pipeline Accession for CH17-258P2: FO681520

issue.summary: GeneID: 729515 (C6orf35), assembly gap
issue.description: The 3' end of NM_018452.2 and NM_018452.3 aligns to a gap flanking AL607068.10 in build 36.2.
issue.resolution_text: The component BX284653.20 (CEPHY-830B11) has been finished utilizing optical map and clone library mate pairs to confirm the assembly, replacing the split finish accessions CT967307.1, CT967308.1 and CT967309.1 of the same clone in the GRCh37 reference assembly. The component closes the gap in the reference between components AL591545.6 and AL607068.10

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Reference assembly contains uncommon allele of GCNT2
issue.description: A user has reported that the GRCh38 reference assembly contains an uncommon allele of GCNT2 (rs539351). The phenotype consequences of the rare allele are unknown.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL121977.11
issue.description: Analysis of GU269048.1, GU268624.1, GU268022.1, GU267245.1, and GU267062.1 along with alignment of HuRef chr. 6, suggest there may be ~10,077 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL121977.11. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: Component AC209420.3 has been added to the reference assembly. This sequence fixes a deletion occurring in component AL121977.11 adding 10.2kb to the reference assembly.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL391385.9
issue.description: Analysis of GU266905.1 and GU267619.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 6, suggest there may be ~4,878 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL391385.9. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: Component AC213202.1 has been added to the reference assembly. This sequence represents a 4.8kb insertion variation.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL024505.1
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines and overlapping component AL513215.7 indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU266939.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 6, suggest there may be ~612 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL024505.1. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within Z94721.1
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines and overlapping component AL133458.19 indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267496.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 6, suggest there may be ~1,554 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component Z94721.1. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL353692.14
issue.description: Analysis of GU267782.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 6, suggest there may be ~2,491 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL353692.14. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL355353.23
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines does not support the GRCh38 assembly and are consistent with an insertion of 3.5kb sequence.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267501.1 and GU267289.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 6, suggest there may be ~3,770 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL355353.23. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL049860.8
issue.description: Analysis of GU268718.1, GU268471.1 and GU268946.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 6, suggest there may be ~4,961 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL049860.8. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: Finished component AL512455.8 has replaced component AL049860.8 correcting a 5kb deletion occuring in the GRCh38 reference assembly

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL132875.22
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines does not support the GRCh38 assembly and are consistent with an insertion of 3kb sequence. Finished components AC206742.2 and AC226139.3 also support the insertion relative to the reference assembly.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268890.1 and GU268717.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 6, suggest there may be ~2,893 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL132875.22. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC base (Y) in NC_000006.12: 61366327 in component AEKP01189807.1.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assembly component AL117345.22 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AL117345.22 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: The update of assembly component AL117345.22 is described in HG-1951, no further curation is required here

issue.summary: Assembly component AL133404.9 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AL133404.9 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: The update of assembly component AL133404.9 is described in HG-1952, no further curation is required here

issue.summary: Hsa6- SMA3 problem region
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an inversion within AL591044.11
issue.resolution_text: An assembly problem has been corrected in AL591044.12. The updated assembly corrects an inversion occuring in the submission and adds an additional 32.5kb of sequence previously missing from the assembly. This assembly is consistent with optical map information from GM15510 cell line.

issue.summary: HLA region- representing structural variation
issue.description: The MHC has several well defined haplotypes, most of which are not represented in the current assembly.
issue.resolution_text: Seven additional MHC haplotypes have been included as alt loci scaffolds in GRCh37: NT_167244.1 (APD), NT_113891.2 (COX), NT_167245.1 (DBB), NT_167246.1 (MANN), NT_167247.1 (MCF), NT_167248.1 (QBL) and NT_167249.1 (SSTO).

issue.summary: GeneID: 3303 (HSPA1A), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: No problem- report submitted in error
issue.resolution_text: No problem- report submitted in error

issue.summary: GeneID: 4276 (MICA), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_000247.1 (MICA) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The MICA *001 allele is represented in GRCh37 NT_167248.1 (ALT_LOCI_6, QBL haplotype). The MICA *00801 allele is found on the GRCh37 reference chromosome (NC_000006.11).

issue.summary: Hsa6_random: unannotated problem region
issue.status_text: Clones selected to capture sequence found in AL732359.26 and missing from the reference assembly can be tracked in JIRA ticket HG-44
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an insertion within AL732359.26
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 7741 (ZNF187), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_001023560.2 (ZNF187) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459630.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AL021997.1 and improving the alignment of ZNF187 to the reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 100133941 (CD24), missing in assembly
issue.description: CD24 (NM_013230) and nearby pseudogene HMG17P2 (NG_001142) appear to be missing from the reference assembly.
issue.resolution_text: Component AL645528.10 (ICRF4X-28F10) contains a deletion of approximately 130kb including sequence representing the gene CD24 (NM_013230.2) and pseudogene HMGN2P12 (NG_001142.2) Finished components FO393435.2, AC233764.2, FO393436.2, FO393434.3 and FP885534.9 have been added to the reference TPF in place of AL645528.10 representing the missing sequence and closing the gap.

issue.summary: GeneID: 26268 (FBXO9), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_012347.4 (FBXO9) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: A non-consensus TT-AG splice site has been determined for this issue. The genomic sequence is correct.

issue.summary: AL591044.11 and AL133255.14 alignment problem disrupts contig building
issue.description: The alignment between AL591044.11 and AL133255.14 is incompatible with contig building
issue.resolution_text: AL596216 (XX-YX55F5_PCR) inserted between accessions AL591044 (RP11-396L22) and AL133255 (RP11-239L20)

issue.summary: AL513131.1 and AL132874.31 alignment is incompatible with contig building
issue.description: Trimming of AL132874 in an accession.version update has rendered the alignment between AL513131.1 and AL132874.31 incompatible with contig building
issue.resolution_text: AL513131 was replaced with AL359634 and ABBA01026024 for GRCh37. Further updates to this region are described in HG-111.

issue.summary: Chr.6 Gap Problem Region #1
issue.status_text: WI2-727A5 has been selected for sequencing ABC14-50123100K18 has been for sequencing
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is larger than reported gap size between CR631131.1 and CR631132.1.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Lack of alignment/certificate for AP002529.1 and AP002530.2 precludes contig building
issue.description: Lack of alignment/certificate for AP002529.1 and AP002530.2 precludes contig building
issue.resolution_text: Certificate submitted for blunt join.

issue.summary: Chr.6 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX255934.7 and AL138884.10
issue.resolution_text: Assembly gap resolved by removing redunant clone BX255934.7 from the TPF creating a join between components AL137220.8 and AL031785.1

issue.summary: Chr.6 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL356672.9 and AL596065.3
issue.resolution_text: Components AL121958.6, AL137184.15, AL590227.13, AL512427.10, AL607036.5 and AL356672.9 have been moved in the TPF to 6q11 proximal to the centromere.

issue.summary: Chr.6 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL603755.4 and AL590544.7
issue.resolution_text: Ticket duplicate of HG-614.

issue.summary: Chr.6 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL035688.8 and AL049551.1
issue.resolution_text: The contig comprising components AL590544.7, AL356131.12 and AL035688.8 has changed orientation in the TPF so that AL590544.7 and AL049551.1 are paired across a gap.

issue.summary: Chr.6 Gap Problem
issue.status_text: 20-NOV-13: CH17-61I6 has been cancelled 17-APR-13: WI2-1308D13 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 16-MAR-13: ABC8-5698149H10 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for ABC8-5698149H10: FO680659 Accession for WI2-1308D13: FO680658 ABC8-40992000M20 has been selected for sequencing Accession for CH17-271O17: FP325319 11-JUN-09: CH17-271O17 has been cancelled WI2-2743K2 has been selected for sequencing 16-JAN-15: WI2-2768D15 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for WI2-2768D15: LO000006
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL135906.19 and AL731777.11
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr.6 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL049612.11 and AL603783.14
issue.resolution_text: Finished components AC174061.2, FO538756.2, AC245749.2, AC174153.1, FP565579.3 along with RP11 WGS contig AUXG01000049.1 have been added to the reference assembly closing the gap between components AL049612.11 and AL603783.14.

issue.summary: Chr.6 Problem: alignment issues between AL109940.18 and AL442124.6 due to tandem repeat
issue.description: Gap to be inserted in the assembly between components AL109940 and AL442124.
issue.resolution_text: Sequences have been updated and there is a 2000 bp overlap between AL109940.19 and AL442124.7

issue.summary: Chr.6 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL603755.4 and AL590544.7
issue.resolution_text: The contig comprising components AL590544.7, AL356131.12 and AL035688.8 has changed orientation in the TPF so that AL035688.8 lies proximal to the centromere.

issue.summary: Chr.6 Clone Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly within component AL731684.1
issue.resolution_text: Issue represented in ticket HG-672. Issue resolved. Redundant ticket closed.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Error in GenBank chromosome assignment
issue.description: AL669924.9 (XXbac-2L19) maps to chromosome 5, not chromosome 6 and is wholly contained in the chr. 5 reference component AC008412.8 (CTC-281H14).
issue.resolution_text: Component AL669924.9 has had it's INSDC record updated to reflect the correct chromosome (5) to which it aligns, the record has also been updated to correct the clone library information. The clone is from the CHORI-501 library.

issue.summary: Chr.6 Gap Problem
issue.status_text: Current resources/technologies have been exhausted and preclude the closure of this contig gap.
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between component AL353654.29 and the telomere.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr.6 Gap Problem
issue.status_text: Current resources/technologies have been exhausted and preclude the closure of this contig gap.
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL731684.1 and the telomere.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: No alignment between AL607068.10 and AL133510.13
issue.description: No alignment detected between adjacent TPF components AL607068.10 and AL133510.13
issue.resolution_text: AL390955.20, AL117344.12 and AL450328.6 have been inserted into the TPF closing the gap between AL607068.10 and AL133510.13

issue.summary: No alignment between AL356123.21and AL731868.5
issue.description: No alignment detected between adjacent TPF components AL356123.21and AL731868.5
issue.resolution_text: AL009178.4 inserted into the TPF closing the gap between AL356123.21and AL731868.5

issue.summary: GeneID: 346007 (EYS), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: The alignment of the mRNA FJ416331.1 (EYA, GeneID:346007) to Build36 suggests that reference component AL078597.11 may have an internal deletion
issue.resolution_text: The component sequence has been updated to AL078597.12, resolving this deletion for GRCh37.

issue.summary: AL449163.1/AL449165.1 TPF position swap error?
issue.description: AL449163.1/AL449165.1 TPF position swap error in recent TPF update?
issue.resolution_text: Component order corrected on TPF.

issue.summary: Excessive trimming of AL591480 eliminated its overlap with AL596449
issue.description: Trimming in an update from AL591480.8 to AL591480.9 eliminates its overlap with AL596449.4.
issue.resolution_text: AL596449.4 has been updated to AL596449.5. There exists a 2kbp overlap between AL591480.9 and AL596449.5.

issue.summary: 130 Kb of sequence missing from this region of the genome
issue.description: This issue is a duplicate of HG-357
issue.resolution_text: This is a duplicate of issue HG357. Please see JIRA issue HG-357 for all future updates regarding this issue.

issue.summary: GeneID: 135228 (CD109), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: NM_133493.3 has four mismatches when aligned to build 37, the mismatches occur on AL596449.5
issue.resolution_text: The reference components AL596449.5 and AL591480.9 have had version updates to AL596449.6 and AL591480.10. The updated accessions fix the mismatches occurring in NM_133493.3 when aligned to the reference genome.

issue.summary: current TAAR9 (pseudo)gene might represent uncommon allele
issue.description: current TAAR9 (pseudo)gene might represent uncommon allele
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459634.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AL513524.9 and improving the alignment of TAAR9 to the reference.
